overview:
Casey Gustus highly-experienced entrepreneurial web marketing executive who has been delivering cutting-edge websites, products and services to market with a passion for creative technology, and fast-moving companies. A dynamic leader with a proven record of building organizations from startup, to profitability, through acquisition. An accomplished expert in all aspects of digital marketing with a strong focus on direct-response marketing and user/consumer acquisition by leveraging technology in new, and imaginative ways.

Currently Casey is a Chief Marketing Officer at Consumer United, a Boston based insurance startup.
